unnormalised: Campus hiring remains crucial for talent acquisition. We at XYZ Corp have successfully partnered with IIT Delhi for years. This year's drive on 15th August aims to recruit 100+ engineers.  Like in "3 Idiots," let's identify the Rancho within each candidate. Competitive packages starting at Rs. 8 Lakhs per annum offered. Benefits include accommodation within 5 km radius. Focus remains on identifying problem-solving skills and adaptability. Good luck to all participating students.
normalised: Campus hiring remains crucial for talent acquisition. We at X Y Z Corp have successfully partnered with I I T Delhi for years. This year's drive on fifteenth August aims to recruit one hundred plus engineers. Like in "three Idiots," let's identify the Rancho within each candidate. Competitive packages starting at rupee eight lakhs per annum offered. Benefits include accommodation within five kilometer radius. Focus remains on identifying problem-solving skills and adaptability. Good luck to all participating students.
